About Me

About Me

Who am I

An accomplished, self-motivated, creative and hardworking individual with 1 ½ years of work experience as a Software Engineer.

  • specialized in Object – Oriented Design and Analysis with extensive experience in full life cycle of the software design process including requirements definition, prototyping, proof of concept, interface implementation, testing and maintenance.
  • Productive in both team based and self-managed projects with excellent communication skills and having a commercial approach in problem solving.
  • Pursued higher studies in Computer Science at EIT in Napier New Zealand and University of Peradeniya in Sri Lanka with a long term career goal of become a Software Architect.

Experience

Professional Experience I have.

  • SEPTEMBER 2013 – DECEMBER 2014
    Assistant Web Developer - (University of Perdeniya)

    One of the leading members of the Dev. Team involved developing the University main web site (www.pdn.ac.lk).

    Developed many other University related web projects.

    Developed and maintained the iPURSE 2014(Peradeniya University Research Session) web site (www.pdn.ac.lk/ipurse/2014/).

    Responsible for handling the online tool (Microsoft Conference Tool) of the iPURSE 2014.

    Gathers, analyses and delivers information from the field to allow the company to develop strategies.

    Software Engineer - (Bileeta (PVT) LTD)

    Developed functions for cloud based ERP system (ENTUTION).

    Planned and implemented new features to the system.

    Bug fixing.

    Unit Testing.
